title: What is the problem with the new Samsung Galaxy Fold phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some famous reviewers are complaining about the display issue of Galaxy Fold. Actually this is happening because of the protective layer on the foldable screen. Every one was thinking that it is a regular screen protector and they tried to peeling it off. But that was not regular screen protector. They are glued to the screen and not meant to be peeling. This is the major screen problem everyone is complaining about Galaxy Fold.
